snippet.title: A Master of Orion 1 game
snippet.description:
This demonstrates why it is so easy to play with Humans in Master of Orion. That's Master of Orion 1, not 2. Personally I like the first one a lot better than its sequels.

As you can see the copy protection ship code, which appears at around 7:50, is easily memorized. I saw a list of the ships back in 1997, and I can still rely on my memory.
